system.description: A complex, mechanical lock fitted with a needle which the user can load with a vial of poison. Picking the lock requires a DC; 17 Pick Lock check. If the character fails to pick the lock, the needle in the lock juts out, stabbing into the hand of the thief, inflicting the effects of the poison loaded into the lock. Once sprung a Trapped Lock must be reloaded with a new vial of poison.
